name: Super Trench Attack 2
description: You are Ada Frost, a lieutenant of the blue army. You find yourself deep behind enemy lines, with the stolen black army plans in your hands, you can end the war. That is, if you and your squad can make it home alive!
minimum_requirements: OS: Xp, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 1.6GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 65 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum resolution : 1280x720
recommended_requirements: OS: Xp, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 65 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum resolution : 1280x720
